comment: Takes attendance every class. There are no test or quizzes that you have to worry about. I only wrote 2 papers all semester. One being a research paper that you work on in class, and the other one is a group research paper. She is always willing to help you have any questions about your papers. Easy grader too. Would recommend taking her.

I am not a fan of the pop quizzes on reading material she gives every time we see eachother. THEY ARE EASY BUT YOU HAVE TO READ TO PASS AND IF YOU ARE FULL WITH OTHER THINGS TO DO, THESE QUIZZES CAN HARM YOU. But she lets you drop your lowest Test grade and you can retake a novel quiz to replace a bad pop quiz. So overall shes a good teacher!

Pretty easy class. She gives a quiz every week but they are fairly easy as long as you do your reading. 4 tests, drops lowest one. 1 paper. She is pretty nice, but the class can be kinda boring. but again its pretty easy

Good professor.  Three mandatory tests and one optional. There are quizzes but she will tell when they are so make sure you read what you need to. One paper so this class is mainly about reading comprehension. Also, go to class since there is only one class per week.

Wow! Wonderful professor! Loved the material we went over. Very interesting class.  If you read the storiespoems you will make an A.  Very clear and helpful. She is passionate and easy to approach. Would definitely take her again!

Dr. Korthase has been a very easy professor to take. I like how she taught. Although the class is not as though provoking as some people would like for it to be, it is still interesting and a GPA booster. I recommend her for sure!

Amazing professor. She taught me so much. She is also very nice. She went out of her way and drove up to KSU on her day off to personally go over a paper of mine that I did poorly on. I highly recommend her.

The class is easy, but I could not stand sitting in her class. I don't believe that she knows the readings as well as expected and she always seems lost. I also could not stand the way she teaches,a lot of repeating and slowly speaking. If you want a thought provoking interesting World Lit professor, do not take her. If you just want easy, go at it

At 1st, I hated her and even tried to get out of the class. I learned so much from her. She instills the basics of all writing that will aid you in almost every future class here at KSU. ie-writing rhetoric; MLA, APA; correct comma usage; and so much more! Take her if you want to learn- her grading is very specific-sometimes labeled Harsh.

Excellent teacher! She assigns easy assignments called "10 pointers" which make up most of your grade. There are also 3 major essays which aren't too bad! Her class is not hard if you ask questions and pay attention.
Very helpful and sweet. There are three 10 pt assignments at the beginning, so make sure you do well on those. Make sure you know how to site your sources!

Professor Korthase is such a nice person! She is very clear on what she wants you to and is not a harsh grader. She cares about her students and this class should be an easy A!! Over half of the class exempted the final at the end of the semester.

I hate English classes and usually do not do well. I made an A in this one. Clear directions, very helpful, wants all her students to pass. She does expect a good amount of work out of you but if you have problems with a part of it she will do what she can to help you out. Wish I could take her again for 1102.

Professor Korthase was a good teacher. She was very helpful and did a pretty good job explaining things. Her grading was pretty fair and making an A in her class is not difficult as long as you show up and do the assignments. There are only 3 papers, a research test, and a presentation. I would definitely recommend taking her for any english class
Very helpful.

Shes super nice, like she would take her time and really try to help. she also teaches in middle school, so it obvious shes very patient and understanding. i only made a B because i screwed up my final. but really shes the BEST. Im taking her again!!.FYI: i really dont like Eng, NEVER been good at it. but i made a B+!!!!

Started out great, but took a nose dive at the end.  She had medical issues & it showed in how she graded -angry.  Stated she had had to change how she taught 1101-probably because of no Regents test.  Check other ratings for ENG to see if this was an across the board change. Would not take again.
Great professor!

easy A if you do the work and go to class. very nice lady who cares about her students. the first couple grades are a completion grade. there are only 4 papers and they are all very short. like i said, do the work and you will have an A.
Easy A!!!
Would recommend her as a teacher. She is there to help you if you need the extra help.
